title: Miniature, "Sleigh", 1853–73
medium: Painted tin, wire, artificial leather, satin
dimensions:
H x W x D (sleigh): 17.5 x 48.5 x 18 cm (6 7/8 x 19 1/8 x 7 1/16 in.)
H x W (shafts): 33 x 10.4 cm (13 x 4 1/8 in.)
description: Two-seated ivory colored sleigh with blue and gold trim, black and blue upholstery. Chassis of scrolled wires, runners, and small wheels, in red with yellow stripe. At front, an ornamented swan's head of gilded lead.

tombstone.epitaph: Miniature, "Sleigh", 1853–73.Painted tin, wire, artificial leather, satin. 1937-67-6-a,b.
